data.title: Cephas Ndubueze on LinkedIn: For all the early-stage founders in Berlin! 🔥 If you haven’t already, you…
data.meta_description: For all the early-stage founders in Berlin! 🔥 If you haven’t already, you should definitely apply for these amazing equity-free grants that are part of the… | 33 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
Another Berlin Summer Week, another spectacular FOMO event, and Noah Lyles has once again shown us that he is currently the fastest man alive! What is happening this week in Berlin? Check out our short summary from our newsletter! 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐞 𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐭 𝐨𝐟 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐬 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐧𝐞𝐰𝐬𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫: 𝐅𝐎𝐌𝐎 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧. 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐤 𝐢𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬. 👇 𝘞𝘦𝘥𝘯𝘦𝘴𝘥𝘢𝘺: Berlin’s Afterwork Tech Mixer 🚋 | 6.30 pm - 8 pm: Le Wagon organizes a cozy after-work gathering, where you will discover the campus with a cold brew in hand and good company. 𝘛𝘩𝘶𝘳𝘴𝘥𝘢𝘺: Women & Climate Berlin - Picnic at the Lake 🧺⛵ | 3 pm: Fancy a swim and a good conversation between women? Join Women and Climate community to Schlachtensee for a picnic afternoon and inspiring conversations about our dear planet Earth. Laika & Außergewöhnlich Berlin Summer Bash 2024 🎺🍷| 5 pm - 10 pm: Join Laika Communications GmbH & Foundation AusserGewöhnlich Berlin in their beautiful courtyard for drinks, delicious food, engaging conversations, and some groovy jazz tunes. Clay in Berlin : AI in your GTM · Practical Use Cases 💻 | 6 pm - 10 pm: This interactive session in Techspace Kreuzberg will allow you to learn more about Clay over drinks, ping-pong, apps and practical use cases. Hosted by Taimoor Tariq. 𝘍𝘳𝘪𝘥𝘢𝘺: @La Flor - Exhibition - Pop Up Store 👘 | 3 pm - 0 am: Delve into Japanese aesthetics and creativity with the art of Temporary (Tokyo), Kanta Kimura, Studio Cuze. Enjoy the evening with signature drinks, Wagyu tapas, and Japanese musical performances. Studio Cúze adidas x Zalando Endless Summer👟🌇 | 7 pm - 1 am: Celebrate the Endless Summer, an open air night on the runway of iconic Tegel Airport with adidas & Zalando vintage gems, Live concerts, flower installation and food. 𝘚𝘢𝘵𝘶𝘳𝘥𝘢𝘺: Ambient Yoga 🧘 | 11 am: Follow Aleksandra Koposova, Yoga Guide and Confidence Coach, for a Saturday morning rich in connection and flow at the Quantum Galerie 🔗 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐞 𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐭 𝐨𝐟 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐬 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐧𝐞𝐰𝐬𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫: 𝐅𝐎𝐌𝐎 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧. 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐤 𝐢𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬. 👇 Did we miss a great event in our highlights? Which event are you planning to attend this week? Comment below! 💬 xoxo FOMO247 𝘗𝘪𝘤𝘵𝘶𝘳𝘦: Some impressions of our event last Thursday. Follow @fomoberlin247, and don't miss our next upcoming events! And the view on Thursday was 😍

What business & tech events are happening this week? Next to our FOMO Berlin rooftop event this Thursday 🤩? Let's check it out: 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐞 𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐭 𝐨𝐟 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐬 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐧𝐞𝐰𝐬𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫: 𝐅𝐎𝐌𝐎 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧. 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐤 𝐢𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬. 👇 𝘞𝘦𝘥𝘯𝘦𝘴𝘥𝘢𝘺: Avomind Connect: Founders & Friends Berlin Meetup #2 🌭 📈 | 6.30 pm - 10 pm - A monthly networking event for founders. This month’s focus is on finance and fundraising. Free drinks with meat & vegan BBQ are on the menu of the evening! - Avomind. Summer Networking Fest ☀️🍻| 6.30 pm - Join this fest organized by Ironhack and Expath, an exclusive opportunity for the tech community to network around free drinks and live music at Birgit! 𝘛𝘩𝘶𝘳𝘴𝘥𝘢𝘺: ⭐️ 𝐅𝐎𝐌𝐎 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧 | 𝐅𝐢𝐫𝐬𝐭 𝐓𝐡𝐮𝐫𝐬𝐝𝐚𝐲 - 𝐑𝐨𝐨𝐟𝐭𝐨𝐩 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐫𝐭, 𝐍𝐞𝐭𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤𝐢𝐧𝐠, 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐧 𝐁𝐚𝐫 🌇| 7 pm - 11 pm: This Thursday, join us at one of the most stunning rooftops in Berlin for an unforgettable evening of mingling, live music, an open bar, and a sunset view - FOMO247. Link in the comment 👇 Young VC Paloma Party @ PT1🌮| 7 pm - 11 pm: Join Young VC Paloma Party PT1, where the tacos are hot, and the vibe is on fire. Sip on signature Palomas while networking and grooving to the freshest tech house beats! 4WARD Global Climate & Sustainability Networking Meetups Berlin 🌍| 6.30 - 10 pm: Join this event to meet other climate professionals and like-minded individuals passionate about combating climate change and using technology and innovation to fight for Team Planet. 4WARD: The local-to-global community for climate DOERs moving the world forward! Westerwelle Foundation 𝘍𝘳𝘪𝘥𝘢𝘺: Amela's Morning Club: connect with female founders & investors 🦸🏻♀️🤸| 8 am - 10 am: For this Berlin Edition, you will start by joining an energetic Barre class, followed by an organized coffee chat with powerful dynamics that foster connection between all participants - Amela! 𝘚𝘢𝘵𝘶𝘳𝘥𝘢𝘺: Garbicz Festival: 🎤☀️ | Garbicz is a voyage, a treasured playground in a reimagined sense of time, a crazy paradise or in other words the festival for the Berliners, and we FOMO Berlin has some discount tickets for you available (general ticket & weekend ticket). 🔗 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐞 𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐭 𝐨𝐟 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐬 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐧𝐞𝐰𝐬𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫: 𝐅𝐎𝐌𝐎 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧. 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐤 𝐢𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬. 👇 Did we miss a great event in our highlights? Which event are you planning to attend this weel? Comment below! 💬 xoxo FOMO247 𝘗𝘪𝘤𝘵𝘶𝘳𝘦: Enjoyed more cultural and sports events last week! Thank you again, Atlantic Labs VC, for the invite to moderate your panel at your event last week.

☀️ 🌆 We are BACK, with our FOMO247 "First Thursday" After-work event! It's the first Thursday of the month, and we're kicking things off with our new After Work event! This Thursday, join us at one of the most stunning rooftops in Berlin for an unforgettable evening of mingling, live music, an open bar, and a sunset view. We've lined up an incredible roster of artists who will be performing live just for you! After the rooftop session wraps up at 10 pm, we’ll keep the energy going in our event space with some killer DJ tunes. And guess what? An open bar (included with your ticket) will keep the good vibes flowing all night long! 😎 𝐎𝐮𝐫 𝐠𝐨𝐚𝐥 𝐢𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐚𝐧 𝐞𝐧𝐯𝐢𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐰𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐫𝐢𝐯𝐞, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬 𝐛𝐞𝐭𝐰𝐞𝐞𝐧 𝐛𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐬𝐨𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐛𝐥𝐮𝐫. 𝐖𝐡𝐞𝐧 𝐰𝐞 𝐭𝐫𝐮𝐥𝐲 𝐯𝐢𝐛𝐞 𝐭𝐨𝐠𝐞𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫, 𝐜𝐨𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐬 𝐧𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐲! Limited tickets are available, so grab yours now! To not get FOMO afterward! Because a rooftop & sunset always works 😍 The link is in the comments 👇 See you this Thursday, vibing into the sunset 🌞 𝘞𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘢𝘳𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘣𝘦𝘴𝘵 𝘯𝘦𝘵𝘸𝘰𝘳𝘬𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘴, 𝘧𝘳𝘰𝘮 𝘺𝘰𝘶𝘳 𝘱𝘰𝘪𝘯𝘵 𝘰𝘧 𝘷𝘪𝘦𝘸? 𝘐 𝘢𝘮 𝘤𝘶𝘳𝘪𝘰𝘶𝘴 𝘢𝘣𝘰𝘶𝘵 𝘸𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘺𝘰𝘶 𝘢𝘭𝘭 𝘵𝘩𝘪𝘯𝘬. I have a very strong opinion on this. XoXo, Cephas from FOMO Berlin

🎤 ☀️Last weekend of July and Olympia in Paris is finally starting! Berlin! What is popping this week Berlin? The next FOMO event, the rooftop edition, is happening next Thursday—link in the comments. ⭐️ FOMO Berlin Event: FOMO Berlin Afterwork event: Rooftop edition ☀️🎤| After the incredible success of our first Thursday event, get ready for an even more breathtaking experience on a rooftop 😎 𝘛𝘶𝘦𝘴𝘥𝘢𝘺: 𝐈𝐧𝐝𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐓𝐞𝐜𝐡 𝐃𝐢𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫🍴| 7 pm - Join Activant Capital and General Catalyst for an evening of insightful conversations and networking between founders and investors in the industrial tech space. Organized by Paula Wehmeyer (Hübner) & Maximilian Mayer 𝘞𝘦𝘥𝘯𝘦𝘴𝘥𝘢𝘺: Ü𝐁𝐄𝐑𝐒𝐓𝐔𝐍𝐃𝐄 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧 𝐱 𝐁𝐚𝐫𝐞𝐭 | 𝐇𝐮𝐦𝐛𝐨𝐥𝐝𝐭 𝐅𝐨𝐫𝐮𝐦 🥂 | 6 pm: Networking event by ÜBERSTUNDE Berlin at the stunning rooftop of the iconic Humboldt Forum is not one to be missed. David Falk 𝐄𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐠𝐲 𝐀𝐩é𝐫𝐨 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧 𝐕𝐨𝐥.2 ☀️ | 6 pm: Hosted by EnBW Energie Baden-Württemberg AG Innovation / enpulse, Future Energy Ventures and Current Energy GmbH, this event aims to bring together people from the Energy ecosystem in Berlin. Organized by Luca Lea Kleene, Moritz Jungmann and Lena Katharina Bödeker 𝘛𝘩𝘶𝘳𝘴𝘥𝘢𝘺: 𝐄𝐦𝐛𝐚𝐫𝐜 𝐢𝐧 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧 𝐯𝐨𝐥. 2 - 𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐭𝐨 𝐟𝐢𝐧𝐝 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐜𝐨-𝐟𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐫 🤝 | 6.30 pm - At this event, hear firsthand stories from founders who have navigated the challenges of co-founder relationships. Organized by Embarc, Atlantic Labs, HEARTFELT_ and FoodLabs. Looking forward to join as a moderator 😎 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐂𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝 𝐨𝐟 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐮𝐩𝐬 🌎 | 6.30 pm: This free networking event connects the startup ecosystem how Berlin knows best... with music, art and dance! Organized by Best Nights VC & James Song 𝐍𝐨𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞 + 𝐀𝐈 𝐌𝐞𝐞𝐭𝐮𝐩 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧💡| 6:30 pm - 9:30 pm: Discover essential steps to transform your app from concept to market success with the Design and No-Code expert, Karla Fernandes (Design and No-code Expert) - and media partner FOMO247 𝘚𝘢𝘵𝘶𝘳𝘥𝘢𝘺: 𝐚𝐝𝐢𝐝𝐚𝐬 𝐑𝐮𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐂𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐍𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 🏃| Looking for a fun sport activity? Choose between a 5K or 10K run, or slide for a 10K Inline Skating on one of the most famous streets of Berlins City West! 🔗 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐞 𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐭 𝐨𝐟 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐤𝐬 𝐢𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐧𝐞𝐰𝐬𝐥𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫: 𝐅𝐎𝐌𝐎 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧. 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐤 𝐢𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬. 👇 Did we miss a great event in our highlights? Which event you’re planning to attend? Comment below! 💬 xoxo FOMO247 𝘗𝘪𝘤𝘵𝘶𝘳𝘦: 𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘩 LIQID - Sascha Kilian, 𝘐 𝘩𝘢𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘱𝘭𝘦𝘢𝘴𝘶𝘳𝘦 𝘰𝘧 𝘩𝘰𝘴𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘢𝘯 𝘦𝘹𝘤𝘭𝘶𝘴𝘪𝘷𝘦 𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘯𝘦𝘳 🍽 𝘢𝘵 𝘵𝘩𝘦 Quantum Oddity Gallery (Dominik Grunert). 𝘞𝘦 𝘸𝘦𝘭𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘦𝘥 20 𝘩𝘪𝘨𝘩-𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘧𝘪𝘭𝘦 𝘨𝘶𝘦𝘴𝘵𝘴 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘢𝘯 𝘪𝘯𝘵𝘪𝘮𝘢𝘵𝘦 𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘯𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘰𝘧 𝘰𝘱𝘦𝘯 𝘥𝘪𝘴𝘤𝘶𝘴𝘴𝘪𝘰𝘯𝘴 𝘢𝘣𝘰𝘶𝘵 𝘮𝘰𝘯𝘦𝘺 💰.

In collaboration with LIQID, I had the pleasure of partnering with FOMO247 to host an exclusive dinner 🍽 at the Quantum Galerie. We welcomed 20 carefully selected high-profile guests for an intimate evening of open discussions about money 💰. 🤯 This exclusive event was 250% oversubscribed, highlighting the strong interest in uniting exceptional individuals from the venture and tech scenes. We specifically focused on founders who have already experienced successful exits and Angels with short- and long-term experience. 𝐁𝐮𝐭 𝐩𝐢𝐜𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬 𝐜𝐚𝐧 𝐬𝐚𝐲 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐧 𝐚 𝐭𝐡𝐨𝐮𝐬𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐝𝐬, 𝐬𝐨 𝐢𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐝 𝐨𝐟 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐰𝐡𝐲 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐰𝐚𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐨𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫 𝐚𝐦𝐚𝐳𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭, 𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭 𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐜𝐤 𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐠𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭 𝐩𝐡𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐬 😎. And please do not get FOMO. We will do more events like these 😇 However, one memorable moment that I would like to share was that everyone immediately dove into conversations after the Wealth Mastery session from LIQID concluded. It was kinda magical observing this 🤩 𝐓𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐦𝐨𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐫𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐝 𝐦𝐞 𝐚𝐠𝐚𝐢𝐧 𝐨𝐟 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐢𝐦𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐞 𝐯𝐚𝐥𝐮𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐩𝐞𝐨𝐩𝐥𝐞. 💙 At FOMO247, we aim to connect people and democratize access to valuable networks. The greatest impact drivers in our lives are often others; we just need the opportunity to meet them. Thank you, Gülsah Wilke, for spreading the word and helping me ensure our dining table is diverse enough! So, if you enjoy bringing amazing people together or want access to these networks, feel free to reach out to me! Special thanks to Diana Zur Löwen, Elmar Broscheit, Christian Bracht, Mona Ghazi, Poonam Balan-Ng and Anastasia Barner for sharing their experience on social media and for their follow-up collaboration 🙏 A special shoutout to Sascha Kilian and Johannes Gamroth from LIQID for making this great event possible 💪 Thank you for joining us! Moritz Heininger, Vanessa Cann, Julia Stoetzel, Anna Fedulow, Wladimir Nikoluk, Damian Minski, Philipp Reuter, Larisa Pitkevich, Ragnar Jongen, Julius Göllner, Daniel Frese, Emma Tracey, Saad J. Wohlgenannt Don’t miss our next exciting events—subscribe to our newsletter! Link in the comments 👇

🎤 ☀️ Berlin Summer Holidays are kicking off this weekend, and we have some exciting raffles for you! Win 2 tickets to the Uber Eats Award at Soho House! 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧, 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐲𝐨𝐮 𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐲 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐰𝐞𝐞𝐤'𝐬 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐡𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐥𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐬!? 700+ registrations for our first FOMO Berlin's After-work event! Here's why it was magical. FOMO247 🌟 We did it! 🌟 Bringing the vibrant spirit of Cape Town's First Thursday to Berlin was a dream come true. Our first event, FOMO Berlin's "First Thursday CPT x Berlin Edition (Fashion Week)," was an incredible success with 700+ registrations! The energy was electric and the location stunning. We gathered investors, founders, and tech operators for a new kind of after-work event that also felt like a Cape Town reunion. This event was not purely business-focused, nor was it solely social networking; it was something in between. It was about creating a space for new connections to flourish. Highlights: 📍 Venue: P61 Gallery GmbH gallery, a perfect match for our Cape Town vibe. 🎨 Local art exhibition, adding a unique Berlin touch. 👗 Dress code to set the tone and ensure commitment. A huge thank you to our sponsor The League, my partner in crime Franzi, the amazing artist Nina Raaash, NOTES OF BERLIN, our fantastic DJs, and Nico Scheinert for the awesome video. You still have the chance to download the curated dating app and use our code 𝐅𝐎𝐌𝐎𝐁𝐄𝐑𝐋𝐈𝐍 to boost your entry to The League before the official launch on July 15th. Register now for a chance to be selected as one of The League's 1,000 Founding Members** and receive a free one-year membership. We couldn't have done it without you! Stay tuned for more—monthly events coming up. What's your favorite day for an after-work event? Let us know! Thanks for coming, everyone! Eva Johanna Egg, Sophie Louise Rowe, Valeriy Bykanov 🇺🇦, Valeria Do, Mareike Sophie Zeidler, Hauke Windmueller, Felix W. Schmitt, Marina Ziblis, Jonathan Muhr, Katharina Céline Mueller, Lena Katharina Bödeker, Thais Ribeiro, Michael Huebner and many more #Networking #EventPlanning #Berlin

The week of open-air concerts unfolding 🎸☀️. Berlin, are you ready for this week's event highlights!? ⭐️ 𝘍𝘖𝘔𝘖 𝘌𝘷𝘦𝘯𝘵: Join an exclusive 3-course dinner with 20 late-stage founders, C-level executives, and leaders in the venture and growth sectors in a stunning gallery in West Berlin. We have kept 2-3 spots open for new faces. If you're interested and believe you are a great fit, comment below 👇, and I DM you the registration link. 𝘛𝘶𝘦𝘴𝘥𝘢𝘺: 𝐒𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐞𝐔𝐏 𝐄𝐮𝐫𝐨𝐩𝐞 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧 𝐏𝐞𝐞𝐫-𝐭𝐨-𝐏𝐞𝐞𝐫 𝐑𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞𝐬 🤝 | 5 pm - 7 pm - Leaders at scaleups are invited to share challenges and best practices with their peers across People, Ops & Finance, Tech & Product, and Growth & Marketing, organized by Techspace. 𝐈𝐧𝐝𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐲 𝐦𝐞𝐞𝐭𝐬 𝐀𝐈 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭-𝐔𝐩𝐬 🤖 | 3:30 pm - 7 pm: This event is a must for anyone who wants to explore the intersection of AI and industry and network with pioneers and innovators in the field. Organized by Merantix Momentum, HANNOVER MESSE, etc. 𝘞𝘦𝘥𝘯𝘦𝘴𝘥𝘢𝘺: 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐩 𝐑𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 🧑💻 | 6:30 pm to 9:30 pm - Don't miss out – sign up now and elevate your leadership impact! Renowned leaders @Ana Euchermann (softgarden), Esin Işık (Zalando), and Anna Skorobogatova 🇺🇦 (Zalando) organize this inspiring event. 𝘛𝘩𝘶𝘳𝘴𝘥𝘢𝘺: 𝐀𝐈 𝐀𝐜𝐭: 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐫𝐢𝐬𝐤𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐀𝐈 𝐢𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 🤖💵 | 9 am - Merantix Momentum, QuantPi and YPOG invites you to join them for a breakfast talk to discuss the importance of the AI Act for your AI investments in startups and companies. 𝐄𝐚𝐫𝐥𝐲𝐛𝐢𝐫𝐝 𝐕𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐋𝐚𝐛 𝐃𝐞𝐦𝐨 𝐃𝐚𝐲 🎤🦄 | 2 pm to 7 pm - Join the Earlybird Venture Capital Vision Lab Demo Day at Berlin Mitte to celebrate their diverse cohort of migrant entrepreneurs. 𝐂𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐛𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 6,500 𝐬𝐮𝐛𝐬𝐜𝐫𝐢𝐛𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐢𝐧 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧! 𝐉𝐨𝐢𝐧 𝐮𝐬 𝐭𝐨𝐧𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐚𝐧 𝐮𝐧𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠. 🥳 To mark this milestone, we invite you to join us today for our 𝐅𝐢𝐫𝐬𝐭 𝐓𝐡𝐮𝐫𝐬𝐝𝐚𝐲 𝐂𝐏𝐓 𝐱 𝐁𝐞𝐫𝐥𝐢𝐧 𝐄𝐝𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 (𝐅𝐚𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐖𝐞𝐞𝐤) event powered by The League. For the first time, this exclusive event is open to everyone, and the best part? Entry is free! 🔥 FOMO247 The perfect venue for this event is the stunning P61 Gallery GmbH. We will showcase two live exhibitions that you won't want to miss. 😎 And some exciting DJs will play some tunes for us. Let's create an evening filled with amazing people, captivating conversations, groovy tunes, and lekker drinks - alcohol-free as well 😍. We are bringing the vibrant Cape Town First Thursday vibes to the heart of Berlin. This is your chance to socialize without endless presentations, enjoy each other’s company, and dance the night away—without a hefty entry fee or long lines.
